Body:
result = pmag.adjust_to_360(str(361.0), 'location_end_lon')
self.assertAlmostEqual(1.0, result)
result = pmag.adjust_to_360(361.0, 'location_end_lon')
self.assertAlmostEqual(1.0, result)
result = pmag.adjust_to_360(12.0, 'site_azimuth')
self.assertAlmostEqual(12.0, result)
result = pmag.adjust_to_360(-10, 'site_dec')
self.assertAlmostEqual(350.0, result)
result = pmag.adjust_to_360(None, 'dip_direction')
self.assertEqual('', result)
result = pmag.adjust_to_360('value', 'ocean_sea')
self.assertEqual('value', result)
result = pmag.adjust_to_360(700, 'treatment_temp_decay_rate')
self.assertEqual(700, result)
